file-upload.title: Upload CSV
file-upload.subtitle: Upload the file you want to import

drag-and-drop.placeholder: Drag and drop your file here

upload-result.max-size-error: The file size is too large. Try uploading another one
upload-result.file-type-error: The file you are trying to upload has an invalid format. Upload a CSV file

import-preview.title: Preview
import-preview.subtitle: Preview the CSV file you are going to upload

labels.import-strategy: What would you like to do with the imported data?

pricelist-export.title: Price export
pricelist-export.subtitle-end: from this category will be exported to a CSV file.
pricelist-export.validation-error-subtitle-middle: while you cannot export more than
pricelist-export.validation-error-subtitle-end: select a valid number of items and try again

csv-file-delete.title: Delete CSV
csv-file-delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this CSV file?

LimitOfLines.title: Maximum number of lines for export or import
LimitOfLines.description: High values may lead to slower performance

validation-errors.exceeding-file-max-size: The file size is too large. Try uploading another one
validation-errors.wrong-delimiter: Invalid delimiter. Use only semicolon (;) as a delimiter
validation-errors.exceeding-line-limits: We are unable to import your file, as the maximum number of lines to import is {{ importLimitOfLines }}. Your file currently has {{ linesCount }} lines
validation-errors.missing-required-columns: We are unable to import your file, as the following required columns: "{{ missedColumns }}" are missing
